Behaviours.Name: Building the team
Behaviours.Description: measures how effectively the leader assembles strong team and leads it, provides encouragement and understanding necessary for subordinate managers to work well together and cope successfully with complexity, unfamiliarity and volume of work, relies on team rather than being reliant to one manager

Behaviours.Name: Climate Setting
Behaviours.Description: measures the extent to which the leader is an easy-accessible and builds communication in an open and friendly way, encourages the open expression of diverse ideas, opinions, fosters innovation, maintains strong team moralemeasures the extent to which the leader is an easy-accessible and builds communication in an open and friendly way, encourages the open expression of diverse ideas, opinions, fosters innovation, maintains strong team morale

Behaviours.Name: Consistency
Behaviours.Description: measures the extent to which the leader shows consistency between words and actions, delivers what is promised

Behaviours.Name: Authenticity
Behaviours.Description: measures how sincere and genuine is the leader, is true to him/herself, shares his/her real thoughts, beliefs and opinions, fosters an environment of mutual trust

Behaviours.Name: Appetite for Accomplishment
Behaviours.Description: measures how readily the leader  tackles tough assignments, faces difficult issues, is willing to champion an idea or position despite dissent risk

Behaviours.Name: Self-Confidence
Behaviours.Description: measures the extent to which the leader is self-confident conceding own lack of knowledge, says "I don't know", when uncertain about answers or decisions, and then makes a commitment to find the answers by a certain date

Behaviours.Name: Push for recommendations
Behaviours.Description: measures the extent to which the leader makes each person feel his/her contributions are important, invites input and recommendations from direct reports sharing ownership and visibility

Behaviours.Name: Drive First Time Leaders’ Accountability
Behaviours.Description: measures how effectively the leader evaluates direct reports based on quality of their decisions, their performance feedback, ability to collaborate with other units and by results produced through their team

Behaviours.Name: Coaching and Caring
Behaviours.Description: measures how effectively the leader develops direct reports through coaching, acknowledges an individual’s or team’s success; provides them with recognition when the work warrants it; motivates direct reports by making them feel valued for their contributions, delivers negative feedback properly - builds rapport in an open, friendly, and accepting way, outlines key results areas and indicators of their success

Behaviours.Name: Talent Development
Behaviours.Description: measures the extent to which the leader supports team’s training activities, ensures those activities are focused and efficient; has ability to guide employees with high potential (talents) toward future career opportunities

Behaviours.Name: Convey Strategy
Behaviours.Description: measures how effectively the leader inspires team by communicating a compelling vision or sense of core purpose; makes the vision sharable by everyone, anticipates future consequences and trends and recognizes opportunities for change

Behaviours.Name: Give Decision Power
Behaviours.Description: measures how effectively the leader develops direct reports through exposure, and stretch assignments, empowers to make decisions

Behaviours.Name: Talent Selection
Behaviours.Description: measures the extent to which the leader is a good judge of people finding the right Talent to meet the business’s needs, has good interviewing skills, highly valuing internal candidates, keeps the right balance between them and external candidates

Behaviours.Name: Positivity
Behaviours.Description: measures the extent to which the leader maintains a positive attitude despite adversity, bounces back from setbacks, grows from hardships and negative experiences

Behaviours.Name: Workflow Management
Behaviours.Description: measures the extent to which the leader tears down the boundaries that impede the flow of work and information between different functions and other groups so that work, information, ideas and technology flow freely among his/her units

Behaviours.Name: Deploy resources
Behaviours.Description: measures how effectively the leader determines whether units/teams are using resources effectively, properly reallocates time, money, technology and people to improve results

Behaviours.Name: Performance Management appraisal
Behaviours.Description: measures the extent to which the leader sets clear goals for employees; sets and communicates performance standards (KPIs) that are specific and measurable; establishes and maintains methods to track progress and performance; provides feedback; deals firmly and promptly with subordinated units' and employee performance problems

Behaviours.Name: Cross-unit collaboration
Behaviours.Description: measures how effectively the leader ensures cross-unit collaboration and accelerates work processes helping the organization gain competitive advantage

Behaviours.Name: Self-Awareness
Behaviours.Description: measures the extent to which the leader personally committed to and actively works to continuously improve him or herself; recognizes the need to change personal, interpersonal, and managerial behavior; reflects on activities and impacts on others, proactively seeks feedback without being defensive, is open to criticism and talking about shortcomings, admits mistakes and gains insight from experiences, knows strengths, weaknesses, opportunities, and limits

Behaviours.Name: Committed Learner
Behaviours.Description: measures the extent to which the leader takes action to continuously improve, seeks learning opportunities from networks, forums, reading, talks by academics and other thought leaders, accepts assignments that broaden capabilities, makes the most of available development resources
